effect_type.description: The effect to trigger when this damageable zone is hit.

trigger_on_downed.description: [bool]If this is true the effect triggers when damagezone is downed

magnitude.description: The magnitude of the effect when activated, if applicable. Should be in the range 0-1.

effect_node.description: [string]The node on which to apply the effect, if this effect applies to a specific node on the vehicle.

source_damage_zone.description: [string]The damage zone on the vehicle which drives this effect.

audio_name.description: [string]The name of the audio effect to trigger when the status effect activates.

audio_node.description: [string]The unit node on which to play the audio event, if any.

explosion_type.description: The type of explosion to trigger when the status effect activates, if any.

explosion_node.description: [string]The node at which to trigger the explosion, if applicable.

explosion_time.description: How long to wait before triggering the explosion.

particle_infos.description: Information about the particle effects triggered by this status effect.
